name: hls-lambda
description: AWS Lambda Function to Generate HLS Streams for Video Uploads to S3

scripts.zip: rm -rf lambda-package && mkdir lambda-package && cp index.js package.json lambda-package/ && cp -r ffmpeg lambda-package/ && cd lambda-package && yarn install --production && cd .. && powershell Compress-Archive -Path lambda-package/* -DestinationPath lambda-deployment.zip -Force && rm -rf lambda-package
